articles.title: Pearl Jam Reunite With Drummer Dave Krusen to Play ‘Ten’ Classics - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Krusen — who played on the band's debut album before leaving the group — was one of three ringers the band asked to fill in for the Covid-positive Matt Cameron
articles.content:
Early Pearl Jam drummer Dave Krusen reunited with the band to play pretty much all of Ten — the only album he played on — at a show in Fresno, California Monday, May 16.
